Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: TL Hickert
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use right out of the box.  Even comes with some batteries to start.  The 6x optical zoom is a definite bonus and hard to find in the less expensive cameras.  Only downfall I see is the batteries.  I am much happier with the built-in rechargeable that goes on a dock like my last HP camera had.

Reviews.Title: Great camera/great photos, and easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Stacia R. Roesler
Reviews.Content: I waited for this camera, bought it as soon as it came out (in August 2007) and have been extremely pleased with the purchase.  This camera is easy to use right out of the box---I selected it mainly because of its great zoom capabilities (the major feature for me). Although I wish it were a little smaller, it still fits just fine in a pocket and has been really rugged.  I haven't had any issues with the batteries, 1 set of batteries lasted for my whole 2-week vacation where I took approximately 200 photos with it, and the batteries still aren't dead. I love the optical zoom capability (truth be told, I rarely use the digital zoom but when I do, it works great:  may look grainy on the viewing screen but the actual photo comes out just great), the stabilization, the large viewing screen, the great photos it takes, and the ease of use. Adjusting the flash enables the camera to take great photos in pretty much any kind of light:  if you want lowlight photos (for silhouetted sunsets, for example) you just turn off the flash and it takes really good, true-to-the-eye photos.  I am just a normal person with no real camera experience other than my earlier digital cameras that I owned (I like this one a lot better).  I could take basic photos and easily use the basic features (such as zoom) right out of the box:  it took me a little while to get used to all the features but once I learned to use them, this is truly a compact, awesome little camera.  I am a Hewlett-Packard employee and could select any HP camera for my personal use, but I really like this one for a simple family digital camera (and the Wasabi would be my second choice, which is a little more compact but doesn't have as much zoom).

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: J. R. Blome
Reviews.Content: This is my first Digital camera. I was scarred that It would be to hard to use.I was wrong. Easy to use and takes fast and clear pictures. the sd card just plugs into my pc and download was easy also.Turn it on and start shooting!

Reviews.Title: HP Camera
Reviews.Author: Fitz48 "Fitz48"
Reviews.Content: Fast service, exactly like described.  Nice little camera, small footprint plenty of features, easy to use.  Seller was quick and easy

Reviews.Title: PHOTOSMART-MZ67-DIGITAL-CAMERA-
Reviews.Author: W. Wilson
Reviews.Content: HP Photosmart MZ67 8MP Digital Camera with 6x Optical ZoomWOW! what a great buy.I have been thinking of buying this combination of 8MP and 6X zoom for some time, but thought it would be much more expensive. I've used it for just a week and its living up to all my requirements and expectations.The seller, Beach Camera, was great too - extremely quick delivery and no shipping charges or sale tax.

Reviews.Title: HP photosmart MZ67 digital camera 6x optical zoom
Reviews.Author: Clifford Ward
Reviews.Content: Received this camera 2 days ago and its exactly what I was looking for. The pictures and features are great. Simply to use. Great price. One thing that could be better is the area where the batteries are place. The SD card goes in this area also. Its a little difficult closing the door to this area. I print my pictures with the SD card and have to go into this area often. I am alittle worried the door will brake during the process. I must be very careful when doing this. Everything else about this camera I love.

Reviews.Title: HP Photosmart 8MP Camera
Reviews.Author: Darian R. Khan "Memos"
Reviews.Content: This camera is neat and easy to use. I love the large 2.5" display screen. To change settings is quick and easy.Can't beat the Price. The Picture Quality is good. It takes excellent daytime shots......really clean.The Video Quality is alright. A good buy for my part.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: R. Walter
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with the features and picture quality of this camera.  Very nice zoom capability

Reviews.Title: Perfect For My Needs
Reviews.Author: T. Pierre-louis "Great taste but Cheap"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my purchased of the HP Mz67, it is extremely user friendly, simple and straight to the point. It is a major difference from a 3x zoom camera to the a 6x zoom.Likes: 6x zoom, anti-shake mode and super close-up mode work perfectly, 2.5" screen, easy to change settings, the price. Fix red eyes right in the cameraDislikes: The lens does not retract all the way in the camera, making it a little bigger thank I expected, only 16Mb internal memory (for emergencies). The design gallery could use a little more options and borders etc.. even though I never used those fancy design gallery options, it is always nice to know that you have it if you ever need it and besides that is why photoshop software was created.The camera takes excellent pictures and I don't have to wait for the next presidential election to take another picture. for my line of work the super close-up mode is like a gift from heaven. I had more expensive camera and the Mz67 out-perform them in every category except for fancier options(photoshop fix that issue). For the price and the performance I will recommend the Mz67 to anyone. You will definitely get more bang for you buck.HP Photosmart MZ67 8MP Digital Camera with 6x Optical Zoom

Reviews.Title: nice....
Reviews.Author: Patrick Nyongesa
Reviews.Content: it has very nice zoom power, the photos taken are very clear but the lens is too sensitive. otherwise, it was a good purchase

Reviews.Title: Batteries & Flash
Reviews.Author: E. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these & gave 1 to a friend - Had flash problems right away & dealt w/ H.P.Support 4 times - They claimed batteries were the problem each time!After buying fresh rechargables locally twice w/ no improvement I got Sony batteries & it works perfectA great camera @ a low price w/ superb tech supportThank You

Reviews.Title: amazing little camera
Reviews.Author: Shelley Kuhen
Reviews.Content: A close friend purchased one of these cameras over a year ago (an older model than mine) and I was instantly amazed at how user friendly it was.  My daughter was looking at digital cameras and I suggested the HP which after doing some research she purchased the HP MZ67.  After playing around with hers I also bought one!  The pictures are clear, it takes wonderful videos, has a nice large veiwing screen and the price is hard to beat.  My friend is still using her older model as well with no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Q. Toscano
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera.  I bought it because I owned the HP R742 but it was stolen.  I replaced it with this camera.  I choose this camera instead of replacing the R742 mainly for the price.  The MZ67 had 8 megapixels, and it had the stablization feature and a more power zoom.  The camera takes stellar pictures.  I also like that it uses 2 AA batteries which is easier to replace than having to carry around a special charger for the R742.  The only draw back I have is the size of the lens for the powerful zoom.  The camera is a little chunky.  It fits in most of my purses, is not as slimline as the R742.  But for the money it was a better buy.  Great camera I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome pictures
Reviews.Author: Tom O. Cave "tcave"
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera for the price.  The 6 x zoom is a really nice feature it takes great pictures and the features are easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Nice but video features not too easy
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Cunningham "knt00"
Reviews.Content: It a nice camera but it's a little difficult to upload video, still trying to figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera, but disappointed about the company's sale.
Reviews.Author: Dick tracy-BDA
Reviews.Content: The MZ67 Digital Camera that I bought as a gift for my to be husband, was great. He loves it. But one thing , it did not come with the CD and other items that was advertised with it. I emailed the company and also Amazon, and Amazon did the best they could on my behalf. I will not order from that company again. They do not comply with what they advertise and plus in order to use the camera the way you want to use it, the CD comes in very handy. Thank you.Ms. Inez Ann Dill

Reviews.Title: Stupid retracting lens!
Reviews.Author: Pookyluv "pookyluv"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a couple years ago...  a friend of mine dropped it and the retracting lens slipped its gears and wouldnt work!  I called the company and and after HOURS of irritation they said it was still under waranty and would send me a new one.  They did so, but it seriously took  alot of phone time and talking to customer service people who did not seem to understand english and wanted to call me at 4am to ask questions!  I got my new camera 6 to 8 months ago and the lens is already acting stupid!  (And it HASNT been dropped this time!) Its getting stuck open and wont close...or it closes and refuses to open again!  I refuse to go through the hell I went through LAST time to replace it so I am in the market for a NEW digital camera...preferably one WITHOUT a retracting lens!Its sad because I love the pictures it takes...the zoom is awesome.... its easy to use.... video is good....  but this lens issue is a BIG problem!  When it wont open half the time to even TAKE a picture?  it doesnt really matter how GOOD the pics are!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, except
Reviews.Author: M. Hollister
Reviews.Content: I like the camera, don't get me wrong.  It does a nice job taking pictures, movies and has a lot of storage with the SM card.  Very easy to use, nice large display.  The bad, be careful when you open the compartment that holds the batteries and storage card.  The clip that holds the flap down is made of soft cheap plastic and breaks very easy.  I have to use packing tape now to hold it together It should have been made of metal.  If you take a picture or movie and use the zoom control wait 3-4 seconds before you take the picture or your image will be out of focus.  I found out the hard way and missed a shuttle launch now I have a clip that is out of focus.  The wife hates that it does not have a view finder, you have to look at the display to see what you are shooting.

Reviews.Title: Totally useless outdoors
Reviews.Author: Alice Hand
Reviews.Content: This is the first HP product we have ever regretted buying. This camera is totally useless outdoors in bright sunlight.  You cannot see a thing on the LCD screen, even at its brightest setting, and the battery saving feature turns it off too soon while you are struggling to see the picture.  Trying to use the zoom with a questionable live view is also impossible as you cannot find your target.  The photos that do result appear to be OK, but you can't count on getting what you really wanted.  We had to resort to our old HP Photosmart 935 camera on recent vacation - fortunately we took both along.  Whoever decided that optical viewfinders should be eliminated is crazy.  And, to not be able to recharge batteries without a dock is absurd while travelling.  HP - rethink your line of cameras!

Reviews.Title: Bang for My Buck!!!! Lucky Me!
Reviews.Author: Ms. Esq. "Lawschoollady"
Reviews.Content: I have wanted a digital camera for a long time but couldnt justify the expenditure and I didnt want to get one with less than $5 mp.  This camera is GREAT! it has red eye remover build in the camera, the pics and clear and the zoom is very good and the software is good.  I am very happy with the purchase and the price makes it sweet!  Great images and now im ready for anything.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Stign Richards "Edgar"
Reviews.Content: Great camera! Takes great pictures and video, and has a lot of awesome features like you can crop a picture and remove red eyes right on the camera. Also, it's just the right size. It's not as slim as some other cameras, but it's not bulky either. One thing I don't like about this camera, though is that you can't listen to your videos on the camera. You can record and watch them, but there's no audio.

Reviews.Title: MZ67 an excellent value
Reviews.Author: George Falcon "George Falcon"
Reviews.Content: I had to get a camera with date / time imprinting capability for motorcycle rallies, and bought this to replace my Canon Powershot G3 for these rallies.  I was surprised at the combination of light weight, small size, and double the resolution of the Canon, and at a price about 25% of what I'd paid for the G3 at that time.  This camera has a menu that's easy to navigate, and the photos are excellent.  Using non-proprietary AA batteries and an SD card are another two advantages this camera has over the G3.  The only (minor) downside to this camera is loss of a viewfinder.  Overall a very good camera.

Reviews.Title: What is wrong with the color of my photos???
Reviews.Author: S. Gibbons
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with this camera. I hate to leave a negative review, but I have no choice...I have owned several HP digital cameras(and other products) over the past several years and have loved each and every one of them(I am very faithful to buying only HP products) . They were all easy to use right out of the box and I never ever had any problems with the color of my photos. UNTIL NOW:( I was so exicted to purchase this camera and could not wait til it arrived.It got awesome reviews so I knew it had to be good... The seller sent it promptly(THANK YOU J&R; camera:) and when it arrived I opened the box, and I immediatly started to use it. I work with preschoolers and could not wait to see the photos I had taken of the little cuties. Much to my surprise my photos were a horrible shade of YELLOW!! So I tried again and again and still my photos were yellow...Now, I'm no professional photographer, but I do have several years of experiance using digital cameras, and have never had a problem like this...I called HP and after over an hour of trouble shooting, they sent me a replacement camera thinking perhaps it was defective. Well, that was a month ago and I still have the same issues. I am not sure what I could be doing wrong. I have tried changing the settings and everything and still they are yellow. I am not used to having to change any settings for the color, as I have never had to in the past and my photos turned out beautiful...so perhaps I'm doing something wrong...or perhaps this isn't the camera for me....it's certainly not as easy to use as my past cameras...unfortunatly, it has been over 30 days and I can't return it. I wish I knew how to solve this problem....HP tech support only left me frustrated...

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, great quality and functionality.
Reviews.Author: Neglycesar Johan Gonzalez Martinez
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, easy to utizar. Very good quality and many features that enhance the experience of photography. 100% recommended by me. The transport process without incident and the item without details.

Reviews.Title: great picture quality
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: What I did not like was this camera came with no standard info you find in a package when you get something new. no instruction book. And it is not rechargeable. It takes aa batteries. So have some on hand.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality Pictures for a great price (Refurbished)
Reviews.Author: Reese
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my uncle to use.  He is not very mechanically inclined.  We just went on vacation and used it for the first time.  It was easy to use and the picture quality was pleasing.  We didn't get to play around with it too much before he dropped it and broke a lens inside.  Didn't realize they were that touchy and breakable.  Don't drop it!  Could be more durable

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: EddyBadinga-Vonga "melo"
Reviews.Content: I am giving five stars because this camera met my overall expectation. The price was great and easy to use. I have no desapointment to express.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: Jose Gregorio Goncalves
Reviews.Content: LOS RECOMEINDO, BUEN PRODUCTO, ERA LO QUE NECESITABA, EL VENDEDOR MUY PUNTUAL, EL ENVIO DE MIAMI A CARACAS EXECELENTE, LLEGO BIEN

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: jea601
Reviews.Content: Worked great I was not sure if it was going to be that good being refurbished. It turned out to be a great product.

Reviews.Title: Camera not worth the money
Reviews.Author: mcrobie
Reviews.Content: It is extremely difficult to get a quality photo out of this camera. Nine out of ten photos are fuzzy. I've tried several different settings. After about a year of use I dropped the camera and broke it. My gain, I guess. I'll go back to my bulky sony until I can afford a new one. It won't be an HP.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Sanjay Bhan
Reviews.Content: Yes i liked this product, above all the image stabilization is really impressive, and video quality is also good.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE COMPRA
Reviews.Author: MILLIE
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE COMPRA POR EL PRECIO QUE OBTUVE. ES UNA CAMARA QUE DA UNA BUENA CALIDAD DE FOTOS EN MODO NORMAL PIERDE RESOLUCION CON EL AUMENTO DE ZOOM PERO ESO OCURRE CON LA MAYORIA DE CAMARAS DE ESE PRECIO.

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Javier Millan
Reviews.Content: The produc is very basic, the optical zoom (6X) doesn`t help to much specially in the night.
